creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: towel scarf of loosely woven mercerized cotton embroidered at each end with three floral motives composed of a rose with leaves emanating from it in spread tail effect; two ovals containing Arabic lettering seperate them one from the other; remains of a tinsel border; brown, cream and yellow threads and tinsel; silk and tinsel on cotton
title: Towel scarf
